reviewText: A Satyajit Ray classic (of which I also have a collected edition copy without subs), I purchased this for a talk. Of course, the movie is great, but more to the point for this copy - the subs were fine too.

Sonar Kella (The Golden Fortress) was first ever film of detective Feluda series. Detective Feluda is immortal to many of his fans. This was cinematic creation of a fiction with the same title written by legendary Satyajit Ray. He later directed the film which was released in 1974. Here actor Soumitra Chatterjee played the role of detective Feluda (Prodosh Chandra Mitra). Jaisalmer fort in Rajasthan, where the film was shot, became a top tourist destination after success of this film.
